topic.fullpath: Topic :: Desktop Environment :: K Desktop Environment (KDE)

name: Kmud
short_description:
Kmud is a free graphical MUD client for Linux and other Unix platforms running KDE. It is an
  useful and easy to use program for all people who want a nice graphical interface instead of a
  simple telnet for playing MUDs.
